I bought 1/2 oz. of this about 2 weeks ago, along with a tiny and highly over-rated CBD water pipe that I paid $100 for. I've since smoked about 1/8 oz. and down-graded" to a full-size $30 no-name glass bong that is far superior to the CBD piece
column4: and I am still stunned by and a bit apprehensive of the potency of this strain. Ice & water Dream Star bong-hits deliver a head rus...â€"

column3: â€œThe smoke goes straight to your head and lasts around 20 mins. After that, the high goes from your head and into your body which gives it a nice floaty" feeling. Highly recommended for all you canna-nerds.â€"
â€œThere was a reason this was a top shelf bud, it hits amazingly and drifts you into bliss within the first minute. One of my top five strains! LOVE this stuff!â€
â€œOne of my favorite happy" strains. Really nice uplifting high. Very stimulating. Nice dense buds from the local dispensary.â€"

â€œI picked up a cyber monday $6 Dream Star pre roll at a local dispensary and instead of smoking the joint i emptied and have many small 3 hit bowls. I smoke Blue Dream regularly and enjoy it so I really wasnâ€™t expecting a noticeable difference but there was!  

For a hybrid Dream Stars effects are full sativa easing into the indica after a while. If you like sativa heavy hybrids this ones effects you will enjoy. It is...â€
â€œA full euphoric, thought-provoking, stress-busting kinda high with super smooth flavor. My shatter was from Ballpark Dispensary in Denver, Coâ€
â€œEuphoric as fu**! I lterally feel stress dissolve and get replaced w good vibes. great for hanging w friends or giving to music.â€
â€œPotent sativa head high, very trippy and head centeredâ€
â€œnjvâ€
â€œAmazing bud, strong smell, strong long lasting effects without being to much.â€

â€œTreats PTSD,anxiety and depression like no other! Doesn't give you the anxious feelings at all. Taste and smells super sweet,,, the blueberry haze really stands out! Gives you energy to get things done! No couch lock at allâ€
â€œThe flavor profile with the Live Resin is spot on, my girlfriend thinks it tastes like peaches, let's try it again.â€
â€œwow this strain has it all from smell to taste to uplifting effects in seconds. this is a very potent strain with excellent results. 4 out of 5 as to feeling mild paranoia.â€
â€œA nice euphoric energy that makes everything enjoyable. It has very therapeutic effects for stress, depression, migraines, and pain.â€
â€œTop 3 best strains for me! Taste of berry haze is amazing! Affordable!â€

â€œFounds this to be like an extra strength version of Blue Dream. Very cerebral and uplifting. Great daytime option, makes me feel lighter and motivated, although a little spaced out. Really nice sweet berry scent with an undertone of Diesel-type scent. 4.5/5.â€
â€œMy current favorite. Some heavy couch lock but great feelings and ideas flow with this one.â€
â€œI don't find the wax as entertaining as the flower itself. It helps with nausea nonetheless.â€

â€œBeautiful strain. Euphoric, uplifted, dream like days with this one. Really surprised me and took me back to younger days  lighting up. I usually prefer indicas but this one ticks the boxes. Perfect wake and bake. At night not knocking you out but mellows you nicelyâ€
â€œAbsolutely one of my favs. So many medicinal and psychoactive effects with almost zero negatives. An incredible strain that puts me exactly where I want to be.â€
â€œwow! came on perfect! Not too hard but hard enough to feel that beautiful euphoria not to mention adding my headache stress level and muscle tension ğŸ’š I lika this StrainğŸ’ƒâ€
â€œI loved this strain. BEAUTIFUL, CRYSTALLINE, HUGE,  SMELLY,  BUDS! Effect was perfect blend of Blue Dream and SATIVA euphoric energy!  7/10â€

â€œI'm a newbie, but I did like how this made me feel.  Got super talkative when people were around and then calm, and energetic when alone.â€

â€œI'm still relatively new into smoking recreationally, but I've tried to try out a bunch of different strains to know what I'm looking for.

This strain has been my favorite high yet! While it did dry out my mouth a bit more than usual I wasn't too worried about that. It gave me a good bit of energy and is one of the first strains I have had where I felt like I could go out and about and be productive on it. 

A lot o...â€
